history.proof: hauto use: @is_RInt_gen_unique unfold: NormedModule.sort, ex_RInt_gen, CompleteNormedModule.NormedModule.

exceptions.exn: In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing Fa, Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : ProperFilter' Fa FFb : ProperFilter' Fb f : R -> V H : ex_RInt_gen f Fa Fb P : ?V -> Prop Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : ?V, ball (scal (opp one) ?M2367) eps y -> P y" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball (RInt_gen f Fa Fb) eps y -> P y".
The LHS of scal_opp_one (scal (opp one) _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing Fa, Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : ProperFilter' Fa FFb : ProperFilter' Fb f : R -> V H : ex_RInt_gen f Fa Fb H0 : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (k : R) (l : ?V), is_RInt_gen f0 Fb Fb l -> is_RInt_gen (fun y : R => scal k (f0 y)) Fb Fb (scal k l) X : ?K H2 : forall (f0 : R -> ?V1) (k : R) (l : ?V1), is_RInt_gen f0 Fb Fb l -> is_RInt_gen (fun y : R => scal k (f0 y)) Fb Fb (scal k l) H1 : forall u : ?V0, scal (opp one) u = opp u X0 : ?K0 Unable to unify "ex_RInt_gen f Fa Fb" with "is_RInt_gen f Fa Fb (RInt_gen f Fa Fb)".

original: intros H. apply is_RInt_gen_scal with (k := opp one). rewrite scal_opp_one. apply H.
